```
perl find_closest_point.pl
Picking closest point between sample and middle, according to euclidean distance

perl find_closest_point.pl group.list matrix.txt -n 10 > selected.mat.txt

--num_each_group <integer>   sample number selected in a group

group.list: sample_name\tgroup
```


### output file
for example:
 DS6 is sample, DS is group, 0.282972695753098 is euclidean distance value between DS6 and DS;
 DS is defined as mean value of all included samples.
